tag: {CustomModelData:70,CustomPotionColor:1852159,HideFlags:32,Potion:"minecraft:potion",custom_potion_effects:[{amplifier:0b,duration:600,id:"minecraft:hunger"},{amplifier:0b,duration:6000,id:"minecraft:dolphins_grace"}],display:{Lore:['{"text":"SP自然回復 （5:00）","color":"blue","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"空腹（0:30）","color":"red","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"感染（5%）","color":"red","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"道端で汲んだ生水。","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"焚き火やかまどで煮沸しないとお腹を壊す、","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"安心と信頼の汚水100%!!","color":"gray","bold":true,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"水分補給はSPを自然回復を促進する。","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"5分間の間、5秒に一回最大SPの1%回復する。","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}','{"text":"5%の確率で特殊状態異常「感染」を発症する。","color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}'],Name:'[{"text":"生水入りの瓶 ","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false},{"text":"（汚水100%）","color":"#1C42FF","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false}]'},rare:0}
